title.narrative: Cross-cutting issues related to child rights and well-being are systematically addressed and monitored

description.narrative:
Cross-sectoral programmes focusing on adolescent girls' empowerment continue to foster integrated programming, generate evidence and learning, and positively impact policy making at the country level. Consolidation of programme strategies on gender and youth initiated to support a more systematic approach to addressing and monitoring cross-cutting issues. Strengthened office structures for cross-sectoral coordination support the advancement of cross-cutting priorities on adolescents, gender and youth.
Fund raising efforts were intensified in the year under review with proposals sent to donor agencies, a couple of proposals being successful with inflows of donor cash. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
